name: Psychic Warfare
description:
Psychic Warfare is LAN based multiplayer FPS/TPS game.

The map used for the game was totally built inside of Unity using "probuilder". The whole idea was to create a virtual scene of havoc inside of Assam Don Bosco University (ADBU),  Azara Campus.

Eliminate all the other opponents and be the last man standing to win the game.. And ya "Grenades" are precious..
